args.name: Cleaning
args.description: Determines when content will be cleaned.  Normally only 'New Chapters' will be cleaned, but choose 'All Chapters' will cause it to purge new and existing chapters.  All files < 10kb or invalid will be removed.

args.name: Headers
args.description: Open Chrome and access any site that is protected by a service you want to get around.  Open chrome dev tools (F12).  Refresh the page.  In the Developer tools network tab, click the page, the 1st item, right click, copy, Copy as cURL (Bash).  Paste that here.

args.name: Preset
args.description: The presets prioritize encoding speed vs. compression efficiency (file size and quality). From fastest to slowest (and lowest to highest quality)

values.name: ultrafast: Minimal compression; very fast but produces large files.
medium (default): Balanced between speed and quality.
veryslow: Maximum compression; slowest but produces smaller files with high quality.

args.name: Constant Rate Factor
args.description: Key parameter for controlling the quality and file size of videos
